description:
T1 - Yew (touching building) - Fell tree in sections to ground level and grind the stump to approx. 300mm below ground level. 
G1 Yew  Lift low-hanging branches to approx. 3.5 metres above ground level to allow more light into the ground floor flat. Reduce the rest of the crown by approx. 2.5 - 3 metres.  Thin the crown by approx. 10%.	
T2 Yew - Lift low-hanging branches to approx. 3.5 metres above ground level to allow more light into the ground floor flat. Reduce the rest of the crown by approx. 2.5 - 3 metres.  Thin the crown by approx. 10%.
T4 Yew (front) - Lift the low-hanging branches to approx. 2.5 - 3 metres above ground level to allow more light into the ground floor flat. Reduce the limbs growing towards the building by approx. 2 metres.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
